name: TVTopShelfInsetContent
desc: A set of items to present using an inset-style interface in the top shelf.

items.name: init(items: [TVTopShelfItem])
items.desc: Creates an inset content object and populates it with the specified set of items.

items.name: var items: [TVTopShelfItem]
items.desc: The items to display from the inset interface.

items.name: class var imageSize: CGSize
items.desc: The standard width and height for images in an inset interface.
